name: render aggregate_metric_double when missing min and max

body.query:
FROM test4
| EVAL a = TO_AGGREGATE_METRIC_DOUBLE(1)  // Temporary workaround to enable aggregate_metric_double
| KEEP agg_metric

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.3.0-f081e45a80af501315a99f09337aa9fb5e4f52ec "No limit defined, adding default limit of [1000]"
